locale.message: Integrate OJS with phpMyVisites, a free and open source web site traffic analysis application. Requires that phpMyVisites is already installed. Please see the phpMyVisites site for more information.

With this plugin enabled phpMyVisites may be used to collect and analyze web site usage and traffic for this journal. Please note that this plugin requires that phpMyVisites is already installed. Please see the phpMyVisites site for more information.
The full url to your phpMyVisites installation (i.e. http://myserver.net/phpmv).
Please enter a valid url. Include http:// at the start.
Within phpMyVisites, click on Administration->Modify site. The site profile number is displayed next to your site profile name.
Please enter a site profile number.
